headline: The 5 Most Interesting Analyst Questions From STERIS’s Q4 Earnings Call
summary: STERIS’s fourth quarter results received a negative reaction from the market despite surpassing Wall Street’s revenue expectations and reporting adjusted earnings per share in line with consensus. Management attributed the quarter’s performance to broad-based volume growth across all segments, with particular strength in healthcare services and consumables. However, CEO Daniel Carestio acknowledged that margin pressures from increased tariffs and inflation more than offset the positive impacts o
